message.entry: At least two waypoints must be specified.
You must provide at least one of the following properties: 'TimeOfArrival', 'Velocities', or 'Groundspeed'.
Unexpected sign change in 'GroundSpeed' property. Positive groundspeeds (forward motions) and negative groundspeeds (reverse motions) must be separated by a waypoint with zero groundspeed.
'WaitTime' must not contain consecutive non-zero values. Set one of the consecutive non-zero wait time values to zero.
'WaitTime' must be zero when the corresponding groundspeed is non-zero.
'WaitTime' must be zero when the corresponding climb rate is non-zero.
'WaitTime' must be zero when the corresponding velocity is non-zero.
'Orientation' may not be specified together with 'AutoBank'.
'Orientation' may not be specified together with 'AutoPitch'.
'TimeOfArrival' may not be specified together with 'JerkLimit'.
'TimeOfArrival' may not be specified together with 'InitialTime'.
'TimeOfArrival' may not be specified together with 'WaitTime'.
Could not construct trapezoidal acceleration profile. Try adjusting the waypoints, adjusting the speed, or increasing the value of 'JerkLimit'.
